meanings.definition: The act of adding a suffix to a word.
meanings.sent2: I noticed many suffixations in the English language.
meanings.sent3: The suffixations in the spelling bee were quite entertaining.
meanings.sent4: The suffixations in her writing were like sprinkles on a cupcake.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's explanation of suffixations made it easy to understand.

meanings.definition: The result of adding a suffix to a word.
meanings.sent1: The suffixations changed the meaning of the word.
meanings.sent2: The book was filled with interesting suffixations.
meanings.sent3: The cake's deliciousness was due to the suffixations of extra frosting.
meanings.sent4: His success was a product of the positive suffixations in his life.
meanings.sent5: The suffixations on the sign made it stand out from the rest.
